[[Leon Adair, Jr. (Bailiff)]] | Episode list = [[List of Law & Order episodes (season 13)]] | Prev = [[Asterisk]] | Next = [[Mother's Day]] }} ''The Wheel'' is the 286th episode of [[NBC]]'s [[legal drama]] [[Law & Order]], and the 09th episode of the [[List of Law & Order episodes (season 13)|13th season]]. ==Plot== The smoldering corpse of an Asian girl found outside the Chinese consul general's apartment leads the detectives to believe she had immolated herself to make a political statement. When forensics shows that she had been murdered beforehand, they find themselves in the middle of a religious conflict with the consul general their prime suspect and his attorney, an old friend of District Attorney [[Arthur Branch|Branch]]. ==Episode Cast and Crew== ===Main cast===
